title.narrative: Qinghai Delingha Concentrated Solar Thermal Power Project

description.narrative: The proposed Qinghai Delinha Solar Thermal Plant Project (the Project) will construct 50 megawatt (MW) concentrating solar thermal power (CSP) plant in Qinghai Province. The Project is the first-of-its-kind utility scale CSP plant in the Peoples Republic of China (PRC). A project preparatory technical assistance (TA) will be undertaken for the due diligence of the Project.

participating-org.narrative: CGN Delingha Solar Energy Co. Ltd

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Demonstrated feasibility and reliability of the utility-scale CSP plant with thermal storage system in Qinghai Province

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
197 gigawatt-hours of clean electricity generated annually, thereby avoiding 154,446 tons of CO2 per year by 2020
